channel.title: Code for closing a door?

item.title: Code for closing a door?
item.dc:creator: @Ketsjoep Ketsjoep
item.description:
@Ketsjoep wrote:

I have found how to open a door, but when it is opened, it still says “Open door” how can I change it so I can close the door again, because it doesn’t do anything now.

I got this code for my door:

if (objectID == 11616)
                {
                ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,11616, -2);
                }

Read full topic
